survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message: Greetings, child. You may not realize this yet, but you are very important to me…and to all Elysea. So I will do my best to help you as you travel these lands. Make your way to Akarios Village. You will find a Bind Point there. And take this with you…it is a gift of sorts for your journey. May Ariel's light protect you…and illuminate your past.

survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message: Greetings, child. You may not realize this yet, but you are very important to me…and to all Elysea. So I will do my best to help you as you travel these lands. Make your way to Aldelle Village. You will find a Bind Point there. And take this with you…it is a gift of sorts for your journey. May Ariel's light protect you…and illuminate your past.

survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message:
Young one, you can link yourself to a new Bind Point at Melponeh's Campsite…not too far from here. It is a perilous journey there, so take this with you. It will help you along your journey.

Be well, child.

survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message:
Young one, you can link yourself to a new Bind Point at Anturoon's Crossing…not too far from here. It is a perilous journey there, so take this with you. It will help you along your journey.

Be well, child.

survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message:
Greetings, youngling. You have come a long way since you first opened your eyes. I speak to you now because I sense you will soon find your way to Kabarah Strip Mine and the Agaric Spore Road…and one step closer to your truth. Be wary as well as open, child, for you may meet a familiar face on an unfamiliar road.

Farewell for now.
survey.select: I will be wary and open.

survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message:
Greetings, youngling. You have come a long way since you first opened your eyes. I speak to you now because I sense you will soon find your way to Ishalgen Prison Camp and the Odella Plantation…and one step closer to your truth. Be wary as well as open, child, for you may meet a familiar face on an unfamiliar road.

Farewell for now.
survey.select: I will be wary and open.

survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message:
As you have no doubt guessed by now, I am Pernos. It has been my priviledge to help you along the path to your ultimate truth.

I must commend you on your ascension to Daeva, child. You have faced many more perilous quests than most Elyos. But now it is time for you to learn the ancient art of crafting in the Protector's Hall of Sanctum. Those skills will serve you well in your journey.

In honor of your ascension, I bestow upon you this gift.

~Pernos

survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message:
As you have no doubt guessed by now, I am Munin. It has been my priviledge to help you along the path to your ultimate truth.

I must commend you on your ascension to Daeva, child. You have faced many more perilous quests than most Asmodians. But now it is time for you to learn the ancient art of crafting in the Temple of Artisans of Pandaemonium. Those skills will serve you well in your journey.

In honor of your ascension, I bestow upon you this gift.

~Munin

survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message:
Arieluma, young one. I have come to tell you to venture to Tolbas Village. Once there, you will find a Bind Point…I advice that you link yourself to it so you may resurrect at this destination. It is a long way back to Melponeh if you choose not to. Take this with you as well. It may come in handy.

Go in her light, young Daeva.

~Pernos
survey.select: You have led me to the truth so far, Pernos.

survey.title: Adventurer's Guide
survey.message:
Arieluma, young one. I have come to tell you to venture to Basfelt Village. Once there, you will find a Bind Point…I advice that you link yourself to it so you may resurrect at this destination. It is a long way back to Anturoon if you choose not to. Take this with you as well. It may come in handy.

Go in her light, young Daeva.

~Munin
survey.select: You have led me to the truth so far, Munin.
